title: Someone declined ready check, "Accept/Decline" still stays up on screen and won't go away
body:
Title.

When you get another ready check, it just doesn't pop up, the old one remains, and you can't accept it, so you get dropped out of queue.

replies.body: Is this continuously happening, or did it only happen once? Also, is this happening in the Beta Client or the Legacy Client?
It happened to me for about 30 minutes and 2 failed queques then stopped. Beta client

Can you swap over to the Legacy Client and let me know if it happens there as well? You can access it from login:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg
I cani do it but I don't understand: do you want me to play on the Legacy untill it happens? Am I missing something? Anyway I'll start using Legacy when I get home
Yes, I'd like you to play some matches on the Legacy Client and let me know if you experience the same symptoms while using the Legacy Client. Sorry for not being clear! D:

Hi! Weekend has ended for me right now:
I only managed to play about 10 games on the Legacy client and it never happened to me, while I played about 3-4 game son the beta client (Ops! forgot to switch) and it happened once. Sample size too small probably to mean anything alone.

Cya

Since OP hasn't gotten back to you the glitch does not happen on the legacy client, furthermore if the new client is open but you are afk for a period of the the play button will also gray out forcing you to restart in order to continue playing.

Ok I'll play on the Legacy untill monday, then I'll post down bere. I don't know how helpfull Can this be tbh since it looks like a rare bug. Cya on monday
Edit: Just to be clear it happened once on the beta client and then never again
I also receive this issue on the new client, it is annoying.
